summary: Seattle cop is caught up in a corrupt police force that he is trying to make right. McQ is a cop with a mission.
cast: John Wayne|Eddie Albert|Diana Muldaur|Colleen Dewhurst|Clu Gulager|David Huddleston|Julian Christopher|Al Lettieri|Julie Adams|Roger E. Mosley|William Bryant|Richard Kelton|Joe Tornatore|Dick Friel|Richard Eastham|Fred Waugh|Larry Buck|Leslie Carlson|Robert Dietrich|Matt Donovick|Jack Evans|June Foray|Azizi Johari|James Johnson|Gary Lynn|Arthur Mason|Steve McDonald|Cynthia Mitchell|Steve Moriarty|Hal Needham|John Price|Eugene Rice|Chuck Roberson|Marvin Rosand|Kim Sanford|George Selvidge|Steve Singer
title: McQ
